name: resexd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(cres(c0, c1), universe), wcel(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cres(c0, c1), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cres(c0, c1), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cres(c0, c1), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cres(c0, c1), universe))

|- wi(w0, wcel(cres(c0, c1), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))

comment: The restriction of a set is a set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
